plot: Sasha Mitchell (&"Kickboxer 2&3&") triumphanty returns to the ring as David Sloan, fighting not just for his survival, but for his beutiful wife, who has become the sexual captive of the despicalbe world champion, Tong Po. Framed, forgotten and furious, Sloan has been wasting away in prison, but the Feds agreee to release him, if he will lead them inside Tong Po's impenetrable Mexican fortress, protected by its deadly guards and adorned by its sexual slaves. Sloan reluctantly teams up with a female fighter to gain entry into Po's tournament of champions, a savage battle where winner takes all - and to Sloan - that means everything!
title: Kickboxer IV: el agresor
